doc.title: Phil Vassar: Make a Little Christmas
doc.plot: Experience the hustle and bustle of the holiday season with Phil Vassar and his family from their home in Nashville, TN. This down-home Christmas special features Phil performing some of his favorite Yuletide classics around the piano, and a few hilarious lessons in the kitchen with his wife, Julie, as they prepare a delicious holiday dish. Plus, you'll see videos by other artists, and hear heartfelt interviews to make it a full evening of music, food, family and fun. Make a little Christmas tonight with Phil Vassar.
